name: protocol-buffers-schema
description: No nonsense protocol buffers schema parser written in Javascript

scripts.build: [ -d lib ] && rm -r lib; [ -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo ] && rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo; mkdir -p lib && tsc && for i in lib/*.js; do mv "$i" "lib/$(basename "$i" .js).mjs"; done

author: Mathias Buus
